entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:47 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
